name: Rescue Mission: Amateur Hour
description:
Help our team of ragtag infiltrators rescue a number of endangered creatures from the confine of a heavily guarded private Zoo. Explore three levels full of ever-escalating security, avoid patrols and surveillance, and try to bring our mythical friends to safety.

How to play:

Use WASD or the arrow keys to move the character, E to pick up and drop creatures. Bring the creatures to the extraction zone at the start of the level in order to release them (by pressing E once in the extraction zone). After they are release, you can finish the level by holding E for a second. 

Avoid the guards and the cameras, if you end up in their line of sight, try to escape as quickly as possible in order to avoid failing the level.

Created over the span of three days for Ludum Dare 46. We hope you give it a try, enjoy it, and we'd love to hear as much feedback as possible, be negative or positive, don't hesitate to leave us a comment.

Code by https://twitter.com/IanZG

Art design by https://www.instagram.com/sparrowich/

Sound design by https://www.instagram.com/tmikic100/
